hero.name: James Marriott
hero.heading: Full-Stack Developer
hero.subheading: Creating scalable web applications with React, TypeScript, and Node.js

aboutMe.heading: About Me
aboutMe.description: I am a British full-stack developer with 5+ years of experience in building enterprise-level web applications. Based in Kristiansand, Norway, I specialize in React, TypeScript, and Node.js ecosystems with particular expertise in Next.js and GraphQL implementations. I have a proven track record in developing scalable frontend and backend solutions and experience working in agile environments with cross-functional collaboration across multiple countries. My strong problem-solving skills have been demonstrated through optimizing database structures and implementing efficient server-side integrations. I'm committed to writing clean, maintainable code that balances technical excellence with business requirements. Currently open to new opportunities within Norway, the EU, and the UK.

expertise.heading: My Expertise
expertise.description: With over 5 years of experience in full-stack development, I excel in building enterprise-level applications that prioritize user experience and performance. My technical expertise spans both frontend and backend development, with a focus on creating scalable, maintainable solutions using modern frameworks and tools. I'm particularly skilled in Next.js implementations, GraphQL, and microservice architectures. I understand the importance of balancing technical excellence with business requirements, and I'm committed to delivering solutions that meet both user needs and organizational goals. Whether it's optimizing database structures, implementing efficient server-side integrations, or creating responsive user interfaces, I approach each project with a pragmatic mindset and a focus on delivering value.

tech.heading: Tech Stack
tech.description: I work with a wide range of technologies across the full development stack.

responsibilities.content: Leading frontend architecture, implementing new features, mentoring junior developers, and collaborating with design team on UX improvements.

projects.heading: Projects
projects.subheading: Some of my recent work and personal projects.

projects.title: FotballFeber
projects.subtitle: Online Community
projects.role: Founder, System Architect and Full-Stack Developer
projects.shortDescription: A vibrant online community dedicated to Norwegian football enthusiasts
projects.description: FotballFeber is an upcoming vibrant online community dedicated to Norwegian football enthusiasts. Here, fans can engage in discussions on the latest news, matches, transfers, and rumors, delve into tactical strategies, explore player development, analyze statistics, delve into fan culture, and dive into the rich history of Norwegian football.

sections.title: The Vision
sections.content: Inspired by the absence of a unified platform for Norwegian football aficionados, I embarked on a mission to bring this community to life. My goal was to create a space where supporters from all Norwegian football clubs could come together and share their passion for the sport.

sections.title: The Technical Journey
sections.content: Building FotballFeber from the ground up was a fascinating journey. I chose Next.js, React, and TailwindCSS as the core technologies. Everything was meticulously organized in a monorepo using Turborepo, and the website is seamlessly hosted on Vercel. For state management and data fetching, I adopted Jotai and Tanstack Query. The UI is adorned with shadcn/ui, Radix UI, and Lucide icons, ensuring a sleek and user-friendly experience.

sections.title: News Aggregation Magic
sections.content: To keep the platform abuzz with the latest Norwegian football updates, I developed a method to source articles from various Norwegian football news sites, leveraging their public APIs. This involves a Python script for monitoring updates on the news sites. The articles go through a meticulous processing pipeline with the aid of Upstash Redis, a NodeJS server, and an additional Redis database.

sections.title: The Road Ahead
sections.content: FotballFeber is an ever-evolving project with a comprehensive roadmap. The current focus is on finalizing the onboarding process and introducing a crucial discussion forum. The next milestone is implementing a subscription and payment service, marking the official launch for public use.
